title: Executive Order 5367-Power-Site Restoration No. 441, Idaho
content: Boise Meridian
BOISE RIVER AND SOUTH FORK OF BOISE RIVER

So much of the orders of March 24, 1910, creating Temporary Power-Site Withdrawal No. 132, and July 2, 1910, creating Power-Site Reserve No. 132, as affects the lands hereinafter described, is hereby revoked:
T. 3 N., R. 4 E., sec. 14, NE. ¼ of NE. ¼;
sec. 28, NE. ¼ of NE¼ SW. ¼ of NE¼ NE. ¼ of SW. ¼.
So much of the order of November 30, 1915, creating Power-Site Reserve No. 513, as affects the lands hereinafter described, is hereby revoked:
T. 1 S., R. 8 E., sec. I, SW. ¼ of SW. ¼;
sec. 11, NE. ¼ of NW. ¼;
sec. 12, SW. ¼ of NW. ¼, SE. ¼ of NW. ¼;
sec. 14, SE. ¼ of NW. ¼, NW. ¼ of SW. ¼;
sec. 15, NW. ¼ of NE. ¼, SE. ¼ of NW. ¼, S. ½ of SE. ¼;
sec. 20, NW. ¼ of NE. ¼;
sec. 21, NE. ¼ of NW. ¼;
sec. 22, NW. ¼ of NW. ¼.
T. 1 S., R. 9 E., sec. 6, lot 8;
sec. 7, lot 1.
T. 1 N., R. 7 E., sec. 24, SW. ¼ of NW. ¼.
T. l N., R. 8 E., sec. 30, lot 3, NE. ¼ of NE. ¼, SE. ¼ of SW. ¼;
sec. 31, lot 4, NE. ¼ of SE. ¼, SW. ¼ of SE. ¼.
T. 1 N., R. 9 E., sec. 24, SE. ¼ of NE. ¼, NE. ¼ of NW. ¼;
sec. 25, NE. ¼ of NW. ¼, SW. ¼ of NW. ¼
sec. 26, SW. ¼ of NW. ¼;
sec. 29, SW. ¼ of SE. ¼;
sec. 30, NE. ¼ of SE. ¼.
T. 1 N., R. 10 E., sec. 5, lot 4;
sec. 7, W. ½ of NE. ¼;
sec. 17, lot 3, NE. ¼ of SW. ¼;
sec. 19, N. ½ of NE. ¼.
T. 2 N., R. 10 E., sec. 18, E. ½ of SE. ¼;
sec. 19, lots 1 and 13;
sec. 30, lot 7, NE. ¼ of SW. ¼;
sec. 31, lot 6;
sec. 32, lots 1, 2, 3, and 7.
[NAME], lots 1, 3, 5, 6, and 7;
sec. 12, SW. ¼ of NW. ¼.
[NAME]
[NAME], June 14, 1930.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5367-Power-Site Restoration No. 441, Idaho Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361156
